scripts.clean: pnpm run query:clean && pnpm run conn:clean && pnpm run orm:clean && pnpm run router:clean
scripts.lint: pnpm run query:lint && pnpm run conn:lint && pnpm run orm:lint && pnpm run router:lint
scripts.test: pnpm run query:test && pnpm run conn:test && pnpm run orm:test && pnpm run router:test
scripts.lib: pnpm run query:lib && pnpm run conn:lib && pnpm run orm:lib && pnpm run router:lib
scripts.dist: pnpm run query:dist && pnpm run conn:dist && pnpm run orm:dist && pnpm run router:dist
scripts.all:prepare: pnpm run query:prepare && pnpm run conn:prepare && pnpm run orm:prepare && pnpm run router:prepare
scripts.all:publish: pnpm publish --filter calustra-query && pnpm publish --filter calustra && pnpm publish --filter calustra-orm && pnpm publish --filter calustra-router
scripts.purge: pnpm run clean && rm -fr pnpm-lock.yaml node_modules packages/query/node_modules packages/conn/node_modules packages/orm/node_modules packages/router/node_modules
